name: Chandni Ismail

my_business:
Iam Dr.chandni, a dental surgeon with 7 years of experience and I represent sp dental clinic. We are a one stop solution for complete dental care from routine checkups to advanced procedures like root canal treatment, laser dentistry, implants, braces, invisible aligners and smile makeovers.
Our clinic focuses on delivering painfree, personalized and preventive dental care in a comfortable and hygienic environment.
top_product: Our top products are smile makeovers like teeth whitening, veneers, invisible aligners all customised to give patient a natural and confident smile. We are well known for our painless root canal treatments.
ideal_referral: People experiencing pain, sensitivity and looking for dental checkups Looking for smile makeovers People with missing teeth and needs implants or dentures Parents seeking trusted dentists Braces or clear aligners People seeking for a friendly dentist.
top_problem_solved: We once had a patient who had undergone surgery for oral cancer, which left them with significant difficulty in chewing, speaking, and overall confidence due to missing teeth and facial asymmetry. After a detailed evaluation, we designed a customized full-mouth rehabilitation plan, including specialized prosthetics and coordinated care with their oncologist. Within months, the patient regained not just function, but also the confidence to smile and socialize again. The joy in their eyes was our biggest reward—it reminded us that we don’t just treat teeth, we transform lives.
my_favourite_bni_story: Yet to create one!

“Better to see something once than hear about it a thousand times”
 We Discover The World Around YOU.  
Like everyone I loves travelling.  When I was doing my post graduate, I do travel a lot and started my travel research voraciously for my college industrial visits. 
After couple of successful projects from my college as a part time tour organizer, I got more inquiries from my friends and other colleges as well.  
In 2007, to make my dreams in to reality, I took a calculated risk and started my own Tours and Travel Company as “GOODLIFE”. 
I have built an amazing team members to help corporates, colleges, families and schools to travel around the world to make memories.   
We are proud to say that we have completed 12 years of excellent travel services to our valuable clients with complete satisfaction without any hassles.
Good Life Tours and Travels has served more than 1,00,000 customers with excellent services so far.

my_business:
OKBOZ SUPER APP – Your One-Stop Solution for All Services!
All Services in One Place – Faster, Convenient, and Reliable!
OKBOZ SUPER APP – The Ultimate Mobile App to Simplify Your Everyday Needs!
top_product: Our top product is the OKBOZ Super App — a single platform that offers taxi services, on-demand services (like electricians, plumbers, beauty services), 1-on-1 emergency medical video consultations, laundry services, and goods delivery. It helps businesses reach more customers and manage orders easily.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a business owner, service provider, or entrepreneur who wants to grow their customer base through digital services. Specifically, taxi service owners, on-demand service providers (like electricians, plumbers, beauty parlors), CCTV installers, digital marketing agencies, home appliance service centers, and water purifier service companies are perfect referrals for me. I also welcome hospitals and clinics looking to offer emergency ambulance services through our app
top_problem_solved: Businesses often struggle to find more customers and manage multiple services in one place. OKBOZ Super App solves this by providing a powerful platform where businesses can connect with customers for taxi bookings, on-demand services, beauty care, medical consultations, deliveries, and more — all from a single app.
my_favourite_bni_story: A BNI member introduced me to a business owner group. From that one connection, I gained multiple new partners for OKBOZ Super App. It proved how strong and genuine the BNI network is!
